page.title: 20Conclusion.
page.content: The changing face of our rectangle is evident.A new bypass is beginning to eat its way north of {West Edge Farm, {Haveral Wood}and{Melville Mains Sand {Quarry.}The adjacent Wadingburn or Melville Sand and Gravel Pits for the buildings of the future.Two refuse tips,lkm apart are used by the council for disposal of rubbish.{Sewage Works lie between Haveral Wood and Haveral Wood Sand Quarry.{Melville Castle {Hotel}is the only hotel in our area.{ {Broomieknowe Golf Course }is beside{ {Nazareth House}and covers 85 acres of ground. The past cannot change,Nazareth House will give many more years to those in need.The bronze age cists which have lain buried for hundreds of years in the heart of our rectangle hold many secrets from the past.Who knows what the future holds?
